mapper.insert: insert into performance (id, ctime, empid, manid, performance, stime, etime, carid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{empid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{manid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{performance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{carid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update performance set ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, empid = #{empid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, manid = #{manid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, performance = #{performance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stime = #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, etime = #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, carid = #{carid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, ctime, empid, manid, performance, stime, etime, carid from performance
select avg(performance) from performance where carid = #{carid}
